briefdescription.para: Function called by CFE_ES_PerfLogEntry and CFE_ES_PerfLogExit macros.

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: This function logs the entry and exit marker for the specified id. This function is used by the Software Performance Analysis tool (see section 5.15).

parameterdescription.para: Identifier of the specific event or marker.
Used to specify Entry(0) or Exit(1)
